Package com.mbdr.modelbased.reasoning

Class MinimalRankedEntailmentFormulaReasoner

java.lang.Object
com.mbdr.modelbased.reasoning.MinimalRankedEntailmentFormulaReasoner
All Implemented Interfaces:
DefeasibleReasoner
Direct Known Subclasses:
LexicographicCumulativeFormulaReasoner, LexicographicFormulaReasoner, MinimalRankedEntailmentCumulativeFormulaReasoner
public class MinimalRankedEntailmentFormulaReasoner extends Object implements DefeasibleReasoner
This class provides the foundation for all model-based defeasible reasoners that make use of minimal ranked entailment for formula-based representations
